# UIGraphicsRendererFormat

**Class**

A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of a graphics renderer context.

## Declaration

```swift
class UIGraphicsRendererFormat
```

## Overview

Create a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererFormat] object, or one of its subclasses ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsPDFRendererFormat]), and use it to construct a graphics renderer by providing the format object as a parameter in a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRenderer] subclass intializer.

The graphics renderer uses the format object you provided to configure any context objects ([doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererContext]) it creates as part of the rendering process.

If you use a graphics renderer initializer that doesn’t require a format argument, the renderer creates a format object using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererFormat/default()] class method.

The renderer format object contains properties that represent the immutable aspects of the renderer’s configuration. This means that repeated uses of a single graphics renderer object will always use the same format object.

## Creating a format

- **default()**: Returns a format that represents the highest fidelity that the current device supports.
- **preferred()**: Returns the most suitable format for the main screen’s current configuration.

## Getting the bounds

- **bounds**: The bounds of the graphics context.

## Graphics contexts

- **UIGraphicsRenderer**: An abstract base class for creating graphics renderers.
- **UIGraphicsRendererContext**: The base class for the drawing environments for graphics renderers.
- **UIGraphicsImageRenderer**: A graphics renderer for creating Core Graphics-backed images.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererContext**: The drawing environment for an image renderer.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat**: A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of an image renderer context.
- **UIGraphicsPDFRenderer**: A graphics renderer for creating PDFs.
- **UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext**: The drawing environment for a PDF renderer.
- **UIGraphicsPDFRendererFormat**: A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of a PDF renderer context.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat
- UIGraphicsPDFRendererFormat

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
